sentences: Ian Fry said Annex B countries should focus on energy efficiency and renewable energy and that countries that are not Parties to the Kyoto Protocol should reduce their emissions levels.
He called for a renewable energy and energy efficiency technology fund to assist non-Annex I countries in reducing emissions and purchasing the necessary technologies.
He also opposed nuclear power as an option.
Fry said adaptation measures should focus both on building resistance to the impacts of climate change, and on restoring the damage caused by its impacts.
He highlighted the need for a new financial facility for adaptation funding, but said there was no need for an adaptation protocol.
